SELECT ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, FIXED_INCOME, BALANCE, REG_DT, MOD_DT, DELETE_FLAG, ADMIN_FLAG, 1 NO, 1 TOTAL_CNT FROM USERS WHERE ID = #{id}
